cream & lotions.title: Vatika Naturals Moisture Soft Hammam Cream (225g) | Natural Extracts of Argan | Promotes Volume and Thick Hair Nourishment | For Men & Women
aboutThisItem: POWERED BY NATURAL INGREDIENTS: Vatika Hammam Cream is enriched with the nourishing benefits of Argan oil. It helps control frizz, define curls, and lock in radiant shine while offering a soft, flexible hold.

SUPPORTS HAIR GROWTH: Formulated with pure Argan oil, derived from Moroccan argan tree kernels, this cream naturally promotes longer, thicker, and faster hair growth, and has long been used as a traditional remedy for hair loss.
RESTORES SHINE & ELASTICITY: With a lightweight, non-sticky texture, it seals in moisture to restore your hair’s elasticity and leave it beautifully glossy and smooth.

ENHANCES CURLS & CONTROLS FRIZZ: This paraben- and sulfate-free formula is safe for all curl types and textures. It strengthens strands while defining curls and keeping hair soft, shiny, and frizz-free.
HOW TO USE: Use as a pre- or post-shampoo treatment. Take a small amount in your palm and apply evenly to damp hair from roots to ends. Leave on for 15–30 minutes for optimal results.
